parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Engine compartment fires can cause significant damage to the vehicle, potentially leading to accidents, injuries, or fatalities.
symptoms: Smoke or fire emanating from under the hood
engine compartment fire
unknown source of fire.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Failure of the Positive Crankcase Ventilation (PCV) hose can lead to engine fires, damage to the engine, and potentially cause accidents.
symptoms: PCV hose failure
smoke or fire emanating from under the hood.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Failure of the engine gasket or valve cover can cause engine fires, damage to the engine, and potentially lead to accidents.
symptoms: Engine compartment fire
smoke or fire emanating from under the hood
engine gasket or valve cover failure.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Failure of the engine mount brackets can cause engine damage, noise, and vibration, potentially leading to accidents or loss of control.
symptoms: Cracked engine mount brackets
engine noise
vibration.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Unintended airbag deployment can cause loss of control, accidents, and injuries, including burns from the airbag's explosive deployment and chemical reactions.
symptoms: Airbag deploys without impact or warning
airbag warning light comes on intermittently
airbag deploys at a slower speed than normal
airbag deploys with a popping noise.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Failure of the airbag to deploy in a crash can lead to increased risk of injury or fatality.
symptoms: Airbag does not deploy in a crash
gases escape from the airbag without inflation.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Malfunction of the airbag system can cause unintended airbag deployment, failure to deploy, or other issues that can lead to accidents, injuries, or fatalities.
symptoms: Airbag warning light comes on intermittently
clock spring malfunction.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Electrical System Failure leading to Vehicle Fires
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the electrical system can cause the vehicle to burst into flames, resulting in a total loss of the vehicle and potentially causing injuries or fatalities.
symptoms: Smoke coming from under the hood
smoke coming from the engine compartment
vehicle catches on fire near the battery
smoke starts from the center of the dashboard
vehicle suddenly engulfs in flames.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the transmission can cause the vehicle to shut down completely, resulting in a loss of control and potentially causing accidents or injuries.
symptoms: Transmission fails
dropping into lower gear
complete vehicle shut down.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the steering mechanism can cause loss of control, leading to accidents, injuries, and fatalities.
symptoms: The steering column collapses
the steering mechanism locks up while the vehicle is in motion
the rack and pinion need to be replaced
and almost all of the steering column needs to be replaced.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The collapse of the steering column can cause airbag deployment issues, leading to injuries and fatalities.
symptoms: The steering column collapses upon impact
causing airbag deployment issues
and resulting in burns and chemical reactions to the driver.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the rack and pinion can cause loss of control, leading to accidents, injuries, and fatalities.
symptoms: The rack and pinion need to be replaced
and almost all of the steering column needs to be replaced.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Brake Pad Separation from Backing Plate
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The separation of brake pads from their backing plates can cause sudden and unexpected loss of braking power, leading to accidents or near-misses.
symptoms: Brake pads fall off
rear brake linings separate from shoes
brake pads break and come out of the wheel
damaging rotors.
